name: Aram Simonian
title: Budtender
coverLetter: My name is Aram Simonian , I'm 22 years old from Los Angeles , CA and I have a VALID recommendation and reliable transportation at anytime. I have a total of 2 years worth of experience budtending at 3 dispensaries , assissting all kinds of characters , giving the proper recommendations of flower , edible , and concentrates. I also have customer service experience working as a cashier at Everest Burgers in La Crescenta/Glendale , CA for 9 months.I'm very hardworking , patient , Bi-Lingual , and a dedicated individual focused on getting the job done properly.
additionalInfo: Worked in the fast food business as well , felt with many types of personalities. I am a hard working individual seeking the correct environment to assist as best I can. In need of a job at the moment to help my family.
